amendatorysection.catchline: Restricted parking lots; cities of the metropolitan or primary class; vehicles towed away; when.
amendatorysection.para: In cities of the metropolitan or primary class which have not adopted an ordinance conforming to section 60-2401.01, vehicles parked in a restricted parking lot without the consent of the owner or tenant shall be subject to being towed away, if the lot is properly posted.

annotation.para: Motor vehicles parked in a restricted parking lot without the consent of the owner or tenant shall be subject to being towed away if the lot is properly posted. Packett v. Lincolnland Towing, 227 Neb. 595, 419 N.W.2d 149 (1988).
